name: Dancing Donna: Augmented Dance App
blurb: An Augmented Platform to Create Character Based Mobile Apps using Motion Capture.

rewards.reward: < << BACKER TIER \u2665 LEVEL 1 >> >   TINY DANCER  Thank you so much for backing Dancing Donna!  We will send you a personal \u2018Thank You\u2019 and give you 1 Creeper to drop on your favorite stretch feature.

< << BACKER TIER \u2665 LEVEL 2 >> >  EARLY ENTRANCE - \r\nShow off one of the world's first trackerless mobile app a month before it is released to the public. Backing this level will give top secret knowledge to access the pre-release AR feature. You\u2019ll be the coolest kid in school!

< << BACKER TIER \u2665 LEVEL 3 >> > JOIN THE DANCE CREW -\r\nYou\u2019re so in!  Joining the crew means you are an official member of the Dancing Donna Development team.  Through a private Facebook group you will get regular updates on the app along with pictures, videos, and regular work-in-progress builds (Sorry Apple fans, only Droid will allow for dev builds).  You will also receive an additional exclusive Kickstarter outfit for Donna that shows you're a member of the team.

< << BACKER TIER \u2665 LEVEL 4 >> > DANCE CREW UNIFORM - \r\nGet an official Dancing Donna T-Shirt!  We have five different t-shirt designs and you get to pick whichever one you want.  We\u2019re even going to throw in a matching shirt for Donna so people will think you two are twins!

< << BACKER TIER \u2665 LEVEL 5 >> >  FOUNDERS POSTER - \r\nTake home a commemorative poster that is signed by the entire Motus staff.  This is our first venture into the world of app development and have big plans for the future.  This could be worth it's weight in gold!

< << BACKER TIER \u2665 LEVEL 6 >> > SWAG BAG\r\nFor $55 you get a Dancing Donna promo pack that is full of Donna dance  floors, sun glasses, stickers, and bracelets that you can give to all your friends.

< << BACKER TIER \u2665 LEVEL 7 >> > PARTY ANIMAL - \r\n2 Tickets to Donna\u2019s Dance Party!  For only $10 more you get 2 tickets to attend the Launch / Kickstarter Party for Dancing Donna (and of course all the fabulous gifts mentioned above!)  This will be at Motus Digital Studio just out side of Dallas, Texas.

< << BACKER TIER \u2665 LEVEL 8 >> >SKYPE WITH LARRY THE CREEPER - Larry is an animated zombie that is in charge of all the Feature Creepers.  We will set up a time for you to Skype with him and talk about all the features that he has been creeping up in the project.  It\u2019s a real, live character that you can ask any questions you want.

< << BACKER TIER \u2665 LEVEL 9 >> > BOTTLE SERVICE - \r\nAre you kind of a big deal?  Do you have many leather bound books?  Does your office smell of rich mahogany?  If this sounds like you, we are going to hook you up with a commemorative Dancing Donna 3D sculpture that will be exclusive to VIP level backers.  We will also give you access to the entire set of outfits, accessories, and dance moves that we make for the Kickstarter.

**\u2665B\u2665O\u2665N\u2665U\u2665S\u2665  \u2665R\u2665E\u2665W\u2665A\u2665D\u2665S\u2665** MOTUS DIGITAL MOCAP CAMP - Pack your bags and get ready for Motion Capture Camp.  We are hosting a day for you to come in and learn all about motion capture and our Real-Time animation system.  You will learn how game animations are made, ask questions, and even let you play with all our toys.  This will be an amazing opportunity for students, fans, or just someone who wants to experience something outside of the box.

**\u2665B\u2665O\u2665N\u2665U\u2665S\u2665  \u2665R\u2665E\u2665W\u2665A\u2665D\u2665S\u2665** DESIGN AN OUTFIT FOR DONNA - Want your fingerprints all over this app?  Donate here and we will let you create an outfit of your choice that the whole world will see.

**\u2665B\u2665O\u2665N\u2665U\u2665S\u2665  \u2665R\u2665E\u2665W\u2665A\u2665D\u2665S\u2665** ADD YOUR DANCE MOVE TO THE APP - So you think you can dance?  For this opportunity you will have to come to our studio and get suited up to record a dance move that will be in the app.

**\u2665B\u2665O\u2665N\u2665U\u2665S\u2665  \u2665R\u2665E\u2665W\u2665A\u2665D\u2665S\u2665** ONE HOUR OF DANCE MOCAP DATA - Have a need for some dance animations? We will provide an hour of royalty-free, professionally created Dancing Mocap Data.

**\u2665B\u2665O\u2665N\u2665U\u2665S\u2665  \u2665R\u2665E\u2665W\u2665A\u2665D\u2665S\u2665** ALL YOU CAN CAPTURE - Are you working on a game that can use Motion Capture?  Come on in and we will let your record all the data you can in one day.  You will receive cleaned data that is ready to solve to your character.  This is the best pricing Motus will ever offer!  (No Fingers, No Face)

**\u2665B\u2665O\u2665N\u2665U\u2665S\u2665  \u2665R\u2665E\u2665W\u2665A\u2665D\u2665S\u2665** CUSTOMIZE APP WITH YOUR DANCE MOVES - Get your very own version of Dancing Donna (or Dancing Don).  The only difference is that YOU will provide the dance moves!  We will fly you down to our studio and get you suited up to record a full set of dance moves that will then be applied to your very own app.

**\u2665B\u2665O\u2665N\u2665U\u2665S\u2665  \u2665R\u2665E\u2665W\u2665A\u2665D\u2665S\u2665** A CUSTOM CHARACTER OF "YOU" - For this extremely generous contribution we will create a custom character of YOU!  Your friends will never have to dance alone again.  This covers the character, so in combination with the CUSTOM APP WITH YOUR DANCE MOVES you will get a completely unique DANCING YOU!!  Partner up with a friend to get this awesome reward or contact us to work out the details.
